data.title: Modus Operandi Inc.
data.meta_description: Modus Operandi Inc. has 32 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.
data.text:
licit Public

LICIT is a feature rich editor based on ProseMirror and an initial foundation of CZI code that was shared with the community. It is React at the core, but there are examples of integrating this with Angular. There is a link in the Readme file to an Angular test app that embeds the editor component.

MO-Movia-licit-plugin-contrib-table-mods Public

Some modification to the PM Tables capabilities that allows the removal of padding and margins to allow better fitment of images inside of a table cell.
